ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade to ASP.NET 2.2 GenericPathRoute Endpoint Routing Error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, You are likely to receive an error in generic routing as you upgrade to ASP.Net Core 2.2. ``` InvalidOperationException: Cannot use 'Nop.Web.Framework.Seo.GenericPathRoute' with Endpoint Routing. ``` My solution ``` // Use the routing logic of ASP.NET Core 2.1 or earlier: services.AddMvc(options => options.EnableEndpointRouting = false) .SetCompatibilityVersion(CompatibilityVersion.Version_2_2); ``` You can use the link below to resolve this. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/fundamentals/routing?view=aspnetcore-2.2
